snippet: For months, Rick Santorum has provided searing critiques of Mitt Romney's character and record. Before long, he will have to forget all that and endorse his opponent.
abstract: For months, Rick Santorum has provided searing critiques of Mitt Romney's character and record. Before long, he will have to forget all that and endorse his opponent.

headline.main: For Santorum, a Hard Road to Harmony With Romney
